channel.title: 474 Clan chat configs with a few packets
channel.description:
Not sure how many people will need this but if your doing a 474 and want it.
[code]sendConfig(1083, 0); //LootShare Off sendConfig(1083, 1); //LootShare On sendConfig(1083, 2); //Timer Before Going On
sendInterfaceConfig(589, 18, false); //Makes Lootshare pop up on the interface[/code]
Also if you want the quest tab achievement swap then send this
[code]sendInterfaceConfig(274, 11, false); [/code]
_________________
Packets:
[code]Music : Packet 121
LEShortA - Music[/code]
[code]Child Color : Packet 114
PutShort - Color
PutInt - interfaceId << 16 | childId[/code]
[code]Component Position : Packet 76
LEShort - x
LEInt - interfaceId << 16 | childId
ShortA - y[/code]

item.title: 474 Clan chat configs with a few packets
item.dc:creator: @Wizard_jesse Wizard jesse
item.description:
@Wizard_jesse wrote:

Not sure how many people will need this but if your doing a 474 and want it.

[code]sendConfig(1083, 0); //LootShare Off
sendConfig(1083, 1); //LootShare On
sendConfig(1083, 2); //Timer Before Going On

sendInterfaceConfig(589, 18, false); //Makes Lootshare pop up on the interface[/code]

Also if you want the quest tab achievement swap then send this

Packets:

[code]Music : Packet 121

LEShortA - Music[/code]

[code]Child Color : Packet 114

PutShort - Color

PutInt - interfaceId << 16 | childId[/code]

[code]Component Position : Packet 76
